description: Part-retrospective application for the extension of the building, comprising a four storey extension to the rear and a two storey extension to the front with associated works.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [Overheating Risk Analysis, BREEAM/PR/201711 - JD, Unnumbered Site Location Plan, Design and Access Statement, Materials Samples, SlimLine 28 Product Specification, Structural Engineering Report: Received 17/01/2023. 
Flood Risk Assessment: 07/06/2023. 
Transport Statement 264/2023/01-CAG: Received 19/10/2023. 
Sequential Test Assessment, Mark & Partners Schedule of Maintenance, Thames Water Letter, 2944-M&P-ZZ-00-DR-C DR100 Rev T2, 2944_1012: 09/11/2023. 
Energy and Sustainability Statement: Received 13/12/2023. 
1001 REV_01, 1002 REV_01, 1003 REV_01, 1004 REV_01, 1005 REV_01, 1006 REV_01, 1007 REV_01, 1008 REV_01, 1009 REV_01, 1010 REV_01, 1011 REV_01, 1012 REV_01, 1013 REV_01, 1014 REV_01, 1015 REV_01, Unnumbered Ground Floor Plan Parking, 1017 REV_01, 1018 REV_01, 1019 REV_01, 1020 REV_01, Unnumbered Block Plan: Received 17/04/2024].

Condition : 2 - Prior to first occupation of the development, details of cycle parking, including the long-stay and short-stay cycle parking provision, showing the location and type of cycle parking proposed shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The cycle parking shall be implemented and maintained as approved permanently thereafter.

Condition : 3 - The proposed use shall not commence until the car parking spaces shown on the approved plans at ground level have been completed at the site. The car parking arrangements shall be retained as approved permanently thereafter.

Condition : 4 - Prior to the completion of the development hereby approved, at least one active and one passive Electric Vehicle Charging Point(s), capable of a minimum output of 7.2kW shall be provided.

Condition : 5 - Prior to first occupation or use of the building, a Travel Plan Statement shall be submitted to and been approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The Travel Plan Statement shall then be implemented as approved.

Condition : 7 - Prior to first occupation of the building, or before the use first commences, a Waste Strategy shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority, and shall include details of waste and recycling storage and management. The agreed waste storage provisions shall be made available for use before first occupation of any part of the development, and those facilities shall not be used for any other purposes.

Condition : 8 - The development shall be implemented in accordance with the approved Energy Strategy. 

Prior to first occupation of any dwelling within the development hereby approved evidence (e.g. photographs, installation contracts and As-Built certificates under the Standard Assessment Procedure/National Calculation Method) shall be submitted to the local planning authority and approved in writing to show that the development has been constructed in accordance with the approved Energy Strategy, and any subsequent approved revisions, and achieved a 68.1% reduction in emissions.

Condition : 9 - Prior to first occupation of the building, the applicant shall have entered into a binding arrangement with the Council to make an agreed contribution to the Council's Carbon Offset Fund, in accordance with the zero carbon strategy set out in the Energy Statement hereby approved to an amount that equates to the shortfall in required energy savings to meet the 'zero carbon' target.

Condition : 10 - Prior to first occupation or use of the building, a BREEAM Post-Construction Review certificate and summary score sheet (or such equivalent standard that replaces this) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority to show that an 'Excellent' (minimum score 70%) rating has been achieved.

Condition : 11 - The premises shall be used for offices (Use Class E(g)(i)) and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class E) of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended), nor in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification.

Condition : 12 - Prior to first occupation of the hereby approved building, evidence (photographs and installation contracts) shall be submitted to demonstrate that the sustainable drainage scheme for the site has been completed in accordance with the submitted details. The sustainable drainage scheme shall be managed and maintained thereafter in accordance with the agreed management and maintenance plan for all of the proposed drainage components.
